Netlify is a platform for building and d: Netlify是一个构建和部署网站及应用的平台。
\nTo authenticate with Netlify:\n\n1. Go:
To authenticate with Netlify:

1. Go to your Netlify user settings
2. Navigate to "Applications" → "OAuth applications"
3. Click "New OAuth application"
4. Add https://cloud.activepieces.com/redirect to authorized redirect URIs
5. Copy the Client ID and Client Secret
6. Use the OAuth2 flow below

**Note:** If your team uses SAML SSO, you must grant access to the team when generating your token.
Triggers a new build for a site on Netli: 触发一个新版本的Netlife。支持清理构建缓存。
Get a specified site. Note: Environment: 获取指定站点。注意：环境变量键和值已从build_setting移动。 nv 和 repo.env 到一个新的端点。请使用 getEnvVars 检索站点环境变量。
Returns a list of all deploys for a spec: 返回特定站点的所有部署列表。
Returns a list of all the files in the c: 返回当前部署中所有文件的列表。
Whether to clear the build cache before: 在构建前是否清除构建缓存
Select the site to retrieve information: 选择要检索信息的站点
Select the site to list deploys for: 选择要列表部署的站点
Page number for pagination (starts from: 分页的页码 (从1) 开始
Select the site to list files for: 选择要列出文件的站点
Fires immediately when a deploy job star: 当你的 Netlify 网站开始部署作业时立即点燃。
Fires when a new site version has succes: 当一个新的站点版本成功部署时发生火灾。
当一个站点部署失败时发生火灾。
Select the site to monitor for deploy ev: 选择要监视部署事件的站点
Select the site to monitor for successfu: 选择要监视成功部署事件的站点
Select the site to monitor for failed de: 选择用于监视失败的部署事件的站点
Select the site to monitor for form subm: 选择要监视提交表单的站点
